rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0001
rows.name:
Vasara, if I may ask...
What are you looking at from
a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0002
rows.name: I see the city.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, yes, I can see that...
Is there something there?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0004
rows.name: ...The lights.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0005
rows.name: The lights?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0006
rows.name:
Points of warmth shining in the cold
hushed darkness, signifying life.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0007
rows.name:
Each of them the mark of a human
soul, living its life in this city.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0008
rows.name:
And yet... How many of those
lives can be happy ones...?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0009
rows.name:
You sound like a poet sometimes,
you know that, Vasara?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0010
rows.name:
You sound like a poet sometimes,
you know that, Vasara?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0011
rows.name:
Vasara... The things you say sound
almost like poetry sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0012
rows.name:
You sound like a poet sometimes,
you know that, Vasara?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0013
rows.name: I, a poet?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0014
rows.name:
I merely state what I see before me.
I do not mean to sound cryptic.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0016
rows.name: Maybe I should ask something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0017
rows.name: Why is it you don't kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0018
rows.name: Why do you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0019
rows.name: I'll try asking something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0020
rows.name: Why don't you kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0021
rows.name: Why do you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0022
rows.name: Perhaps I should ask something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0023
rows.name: Why is it you refuse to kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0024
rows.name: Why do you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0025
rows.name: I think I'll ask something.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0026
rows.name: So how come you don't kill?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0027
rows.name: So how come you help people?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0101
rows.name: A fitting question.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0102
rows.name:
Rather than strike down the wicked,
I prefer to strike down the wickedness
in their hearts.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0103
rows.name:
As such, though I do not take
the lives of men...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0104
rows.name: It is not out of mercy or compassion.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0105
rows.name: Rather, death is too easy a way out.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0106
rows.name: Way out?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0107
rows.name:
To strike down an evildoer is to take
their life as payment for their sins, yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0108
rows.name:
But I do not feel sins can be
paid for so easily.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0109
rows.name:
To carry on living and atoning... As
penance, it is more fitting than death.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0110
rows.name:
That is why I do it. Because I believe
sins should be atoned for.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0111
rows.name: Living is harder than dying...?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0112
rows.name: You really are a poet, Vasara!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0113
rows.name: Living is harder than dying...?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0114
rows.name: You really are a poet, Vasara!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0115
rows.name: Living is harder than dying...?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0116
rows.name: Truly you are a poet, Vasara.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0117
rows.name: Living is harder than dying...?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0118
rows.name: You really are a poet, Vasara!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0119
rows.name: Oh, I am no poet...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0120
rows.name: I am but one Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0121
rows.name:
I hope you'll join me in cutting down
evildoers when the time comes.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0201
rows.name: ...A difficult question.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0202
rows.name:
To make the world a better place...
That would be an easy answer to give.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0203
rows.name: But I do not pursue such lofty goals.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0204
rows.name:
Why do you do it, then? Saving people,
just like that time recently...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0205
rows.name:
Many would claim all people are equal,
but it does not seem that way to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0206
rows.name:
The rules that govern this world are
still unjust and crooked...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0207
rows.name:
The weak are abused by the strong,
who bend morality and law to evil ends.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0208
rows.name:
I find such acts distasteful, so I
prefer to side with those in need.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0209
rows.name: It is as simple as that.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0210
rows.name:
So you just want to help people when
you see them suffering, is that it?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0211
rows.name:
That sounds like a long and difficult
road to travel, but I'll walk it with you!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0212
rows.name:
So you just can't stand by and
watch people suffer, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0213
rows.name:
That's a nice attitude. Especially
if you really manage to live by it.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0214
rows.name:
In other words, you guard the weak
against the strong?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0215
rows.name:
That stance agrees with me.
I look forward to the work we'll do.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0216
rows.name:
So you strike down evildoers just
'cos it's the right thing to do?

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0217
rows.name:
Nice and simple.
That suits me fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0218
rows.name: Hahaha...

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0219
rows.name:
That means a lot. It's thanks to you that
I can continue walking my path.

rows.label: kizunatalk058_msg0220
rows.name:
So I thank you, my Driver.
I will be counting on you.
